author: Staff Reporter
text:
As many as 1,123 cases were resolved and Rs. 80 lakh compensation was awarded to the litigants during the Lok Adalat held at Nagercoil, Thuckalay, Padmanabhapuram, Kuzhithurai and Eraniel courts on Saturday, sources said.

Lok Adalat was inaugurated by District Judge (in-charge) Sengamalaselvan. A total of 1,890 cases were taken up at the Lok Adalat.
title: Cases resolved
